sentences.en: Children are very conservative where food is concerned, they are very loath to try anything out of the ordinary.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在食物上非常保守, 他们非常不愿意尝任何特殊的东西.

sentences.en: Everyone looked at him as if loath to let him leave.
sentences.cn: 大家看着他,仿佛唯恐他走了.

sentences.en: He consented at once, nothing loath.
sentences.cn: 他非常乐意地立即同意了.

sentences.en: He is loath to get out of bed on cold mornings.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷的早晨他讨厌起床.

sentences.en: He spent so many unforgettable days with them that he was loath to part with them.
sentences.cn: 他与他们一起度过那么多难忘的日子,他舍不得离开他们.

sentences.en: He was loath to admit his mistake.
sentences.cn: 他不愿承认自己的错误。

sentences.en: He was loath to be left alone.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意独自被留下来.

sentences.en: I felt loath to sully the gleaming brass knocker by handling it.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意伸手去抓那闪亮的黄铜门环，怕把它弄脏。

sentences.en: I was very loath to dispose of them for a trifle.
sentences.cn: 我极不愿意得到一点点钱,就把它们让给了别人.

sentences.en: If discover the child is honest, do not like not loath also child.
sentences.cn: 如发现孩子实在不喜欢也不要勉强孩子.

sentences.en: Sarah was loath to tell her mother what had happened.
sentences.cn: 萨拉不愿意告诉母亲所发生的事。

sentences.en: Sensing he held the advantage, Mr. Danbar was loath to change the subject.
sentences.cn: 丹巴先生觉得占有优势，不愿改变话题。

sentences.en: She is loath to give up her hard-earned liberty.
sentences.cn: 她不愿放弃好不容易得来的自由。

sentences.en: The little girl was loath to leave her mother.
sentences.cn: 那小女孩不愿离开她的母亲.

sentences.en: The new finance minister seems loath to cut income tax.
sentences.cn: 新任财政部长似乎不愿削减所得税。

sentences.en: When he suggested a meal, I was nothing loath.
sentences.cn: 当他提议吃饭时, 我高兴极了 loathness

trans.tran_en: to be unwilling to do something
